subject: Hockey, Ice
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: The author, then a baby, and his parents, attended the four-overtime Game 7 of the 1987 division semifinal series between the Islanders and the Capitals known as the Easter Epic.
snippet: The author, then a baby, and his parents, attended the four-overtime Game 7 of the 1987 division semifinal series between the Islanders and the Capitals known as the Easter Epic.
